metadata.name: Dessert Time
metadata.description:
Desserts have a special way of bringing people together. "Dessert Time" encapsulates some of my favourite all-time go-to traditional treats in Doodverse where you can take a dip in the cendol onsen or ride the magic tutu kueh with your loved ones – it's where sugar and spice meet mischief and laughter. The fun never ends! Be it dawn or dusk, there’s always someone somewhere in this world who is craving for their favourite dessert.

This artwork is a dynamic NFT that mirrors Singapore real-time data, unfolding 5 different scenes throughout the day. As the clock ticks, each scene unveils a unique narrative, inviting viewers to immerse in joyful tales and delectable realms. “Dessert Time” pushes the boundaries of traditional art forms and let viewers reimagine the possibilities of digital art in our ever-changing world.

Twilight: 0000 - 0259  
Dawn: 0300 - 0759  
Daylight: 0800 - 1459  
Dusk: 1500 - 2059  
Dark: 2100 - 2359

View the dynamic NFT in real-time here:  
https://arweave.net/OilUMgyjKSVdmS2byPACiF7WrCpVhst8c0hGod2Gchg  
https://opensea.io/assets/ethereum/0x006f9d2b67edc161b3265ec111005933e04b3cee/1

6000 px by 4000 px, dynamic NFT
